content: BAD finance was formed in the early 2011 by three guys, Sakari, Antti and Jari, all working at Futurice Tampere. The band started reheasing at Jari's student dorm in Hervanta but after Futurice office moved into bigger premises the boys got their own band room.
highlights: Bad Finance rocked the place at Futurice Christmas Party 2012.
contact_info: Generic contact info, ie. email and phone number
name: Bad Finance
